scripts.test: echo please see `Running and debugging tests` section in readme.md
scripts.testIntegHelp: echo By default this command only runs unit tests.To Run integration tests, please see `Running and debugging tests` section in readme.md
scripts.testChromium: npm run testIntegHelp && npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.testChromiumDist: npm run testIntegHelp && npx cross-env TEST_DIST=true npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.testChromiumDistDebug: npm run testIntegHelp && npx cross-env TEST_DIST=true npx playwright test --project=chromium --debug
scripts.testChromiumDebug: npm run testIntegHelp && npx playwright test --project=chromium --debug
scripts.testFirefox: npm run testIntegHelp && npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.testFirefoxDist: npm run testIntegHelp && npx cross-env TEST_DIST=true npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.testFirefoxDistDebug: npm run testIntegHelp && npx cross-env TEST_DIST=true npx playwright test --project=firefox --debug
scripts.testFirefoxDebug: npm run testIntegHelp && npx playwright test --project=firefox --debug
scripts._vulnerabilityCheck: echo Scanning for vulnarabilities && npm audit --prod --audit-level=critical
scripts.build: npm run _create-src-node-pkg-lock && npm run _buildonly && npm run createJSDocs && npm run zipTestFiles && npm run lint && npm run _vulnerabilityCheck
scripts.build:debug: npm run _create-src-node-pkg-lock && npm run _buildonlyDebug && npm run createJSDocs && npm run zipTestFiles && npm run lint && npm run _vulnerabilityCheck
scripts._serveWithWebCacheHelp: echo !!!Make sure to npm run release:dev/stageing/prod before testing the cache!!!
scripts._minify: r.js -o require.min.config.js && echo this is untested see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/14337970/minifying-requirejs-javascript-codebase-to-a-single-file
